post_title: 2 T206 cards left to complete set
post_content:
Guys,
I am down to 2 cards to complete the monster.  Need PSA 4 or higher Pelty Horizontal and Molesworth.  Any help would be just awesome.  20 years and down to 2 cards.  Thanks in advance.  

Daniel

That's awesome.

Hard work pays off. 

Happy for you.

20 years!!
That's super awesome.  Has to feel good to be on the closing stretch.

Best of luck in your search for the last 2.
I am very excited.  Just ready to track down those 2 cards.  Several people on this forum have helped locate the cards…Net54 is such a great community.
